titles.title: A resolution designating the week of March 9, 2014, through March 15, 2014, as "National Youth Synthetic Drug Awareness Week".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
3/13/2014--Passed Senate without amendment. Designates the week of March 9-March 15, 2014, as National Youth Synthetic Drug Awareness Week.
Urges communities to carry out programs and activities to educate parents and youth about the dangers associated with synthetic drug abuse.
